The median is not necessarily the average and for Auckland housing market most definitely not equal #postcab *seething on the inside*
@jamespeshaw @JulieAnneGenter not that issue. But some candidates both for and against various issues including island bay cycle way
@JulieAnneGenter both!
Break for tea. #meetthecandidates
Last question. How many houses do you own. #meetthecandidates
Paul eagle. Ran a petition against it. But isn't saying no now. Will support community lead solution. #meetthecandidates
Poetry red haired cyclists are good. #meetthecandidates
David Lee = yes #meetthecandidates
Island bay cycle way. #meetthecandidates
Brendon bonner hits out at his generation buying up houses in there 50s #meetthecandidates
Unmetetered water. Brendon bonner. #meetthecandidates
Poetry. On water. I have a shower once a week. Less. Maybe. Gold. #meetthecandidates
Pierson doesn't support metering. #meetthecandidates
David Lee supports water metering. Talks about stopping lakes. We have deferred second damn by fixing leaks. #meetthecandidates
Next question first mic fail. Water metering.
40% turnout. 90% complaints afterwards. #meetthecandidates
Brendon endorse Paul. How will you ensure that or this. I can't insure anything. All I can do is give it my best shot. #meetthecandidates
Poetry. Some people have a second house. #meetthecandidates
Paul eagle references district plan. #meetthecandidates more character.
David Lee talks road enclosure on tory st. #meetthecandidates
Brent Pierson hits back a fan of minimum parking requirements. #meetthecandidates
Hey @JulieAnneGenter minimum parking requirements being raised at #meetthecandidates Newtown.
Paul eagle hits sea level rise on south coast right away. Thanks David Lee. #meetthecandidates
How wide is four lanes to the planes? #meetthecandidates
The roads are going to be 90 meters wide. You cannot cross. #meetthecandidates
More poetry. I hear the planet groaning. #meetthecandidates
David Lee climate change is my portfolio. Lists what wcc Green econ reduce emissions. councils own ghg. Waste. #meetthecandidates
Can't keep robbing the environment you have to pay it back. #meetthecandidates Pierson.
Brent Pierson. Live within limits. Keep trolley buses. #meetthecandidates
Attacks middle class liberals who care about penguins. #meetthecandidates
Brendon bonner talks about balance. #meetthecandidates
Climate change in one minute. Go #meetthecandidates
Audience question first up climate. #meetthecandidates
Where is best to eat in Newtown?
@ClintVSmith it's Brent! Oops #meetthecandidates https://t.co/eBbPDv0wta
@ClintVSmith maybe. I'm confused.
A road can't exist without people! #meetthecandidates
Paul eagle transport. Let's reflect on the last few years the basin and island bay. #meetthecandidates
More poetry. Less cars, bus be twice as quick. Don't slack back to your cars. #meetthecandidates
Solution to basin is a school in karori. David Lee #meetthecandidates
David Lee @NZGreens transport problems are poor urban planning. What happens in school holidays?
Auckland will fall into a big hole. #meetthecandidates people from auck can fall off planet. Steve Pierson.
First heckle of candidate. In answer to a question. #meetthecandidates
Basin reserve cut and cover. Steve peirson . #meetthecandidates
We had light rail in 1908. We can afford it then why not now. #meetthecandidates
Keep the trolley buses till electric buses here #meetthecandidates
Transport a favourite subject of Steve pierson. #meetthecandidates
Conditional support or opposal of runway. Brendon bonner. #meetthecandidates
Where are the routes for light rail. Where is bus conjestion?
Brendon starts talking about eastern suburbs. No more tunnels. Out of cars into public transport. #meetthecandidates not a light rail fan.
Same order. #meetthecandidates
Warning bell at three minutes.
Next up transport. #meetthecandidates talk about light rail vs four lanes to the planes.
Support for affordable housing attacks govt running down state housing.#meetthecandidates
Paul eagle focus on Auckland but I don't want to see Newtown be the next ponsonby. #meetthecandidates
Don Mcdonald sums up problem. Not enough houses! #meetthecandidates
Don. Mcdonald. A gold coin cubed 70 meters of housing debt. And greedy banks and cars
Four pronged approach. Including push four capital gains and address supply with support for apprenticeships #meetthecandidates
David Lee housing is a basic right. @NZGreens ##meetthecandidates
Rent should be based on ability to pay. #meetthecandidates
Steve Pierson. We can't do anything about house prices. But calls for building social housing stock. #meetthecandidates
Michael Joseph savage reference before call for wcc to build houses. Brendon bonner. #meetthecandidates
Where are the age cared workers gonna live? #meetthecandidates
Falling back on local govt cause central govt won't address. #meetthecandidates
Brendon bonner. Have we got a crisis muted yes
A minute or two each on housing affordiblity. Should house prices rise or fall. #meetthecandidates
Now the hot issues. #meetthecandidates
Clap for social housing. #meetthecandidates
We need more buses. ~ #meetthecandidates
Now Don Mcdonald with a poem. #meetthecandidates
Now David Lee @NZGreens. Talks about his experience. And opposes airport extension.
Now talking about investing in airport. :( #meetthecandidates
Brent Pierson next. Supports supports living wage. :) #meetthecandidates but qualifies with as far as I could.
Brendon bonner thinks he has a long time. But looses track of time. #meetthecandidates
Confusion over timing but the egg timer will rule supreme. #meetthecandidates
Apparently we using #meetthecandidates #wccmeetcandidates
